name: It is rainy
description:
"It is rainy" - is a small meditative game made for Ludum Dare 49.

You got your place at meteorology station. Predict weather and try not to lose your work.

Oh, wait you are still here? I want to say one truth to you: This game has giant lack of gameplay, so, enjoy atmosphere and sleep, just like you will never do in your real life ;)
